tacos.title: Carne Asada Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft-shell 4 inch corn tortilla garnish with flank steak, white onion, cilantro in the french fries on the side.

tacos.title: Pollo Asado Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft shell 4 inch corn tortilla with grilled chicken, white onion, cilantro in the french fries on the side.

tacos.title: Chorizo Tacos
tacos.description: 3 soft shell 4 inch corn tortilla filled with Mexican sausage, white onion, cilantro in the french fries on the side.

burritos.title: Carne Asada Burritos
burritos.description: Flank steak, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.

burritos.title: Pollo Asado Burritos
burritos.description: Grilled chicken, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.

burritos.title: Chorizo Burritos
burritos.description: Mexican sausage, black beans, lettuce, jalapeno, ranchero sauce, sour cream, avocado mayonnaise & side fries.

quesadillas.title: Carnitas Quesadilla
quesadillas.description: A 1 inch tortilla filled with pulled pork Monterrey Jack cheese, garnished with sour cream, lettuce, ranchera sauce and side fries.
